responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "EC9A16B143D55B6E0E02AEBBAD07CEFD", "It\'s nothing more sinister than the mere fact that the blight of poverty befouls the creeks around here. The caravans arrive if only because we\'re the only people who are worth trading with in this part of town. You wouldn\'t bat an eye trying to sell to people who can\'t afford the rags they wear on their shoulders.")
name: MADD_0008_BrotherHugh_34
